paper_metadata.title: The impacts of carbon sink afforestation project on county industrial structural upgrading: Evidence from China

study_characteristics.outcomes_evidence_citation: This paper estimates the impacts of CSAP on ISU through difference-in-differences with variation in treatment timing (VTT-DID) and synthetic control method
study_characteristics.study_design: Difference-in-differences with variation in treatment timing (VTT-DID) and synthetic control method
study_characteristics.design_evidence_citation: Based on the panel data of counties in Sichuan Province, China in 2000-2016, this paper estimates the impacts of CSAP on ISU through difference-in-differences with variation in treatment timing (VTT-DID) and synthetic control method

evidence_citations.program_name_citation: Carbon sink afforestation project (CSAP), an important means to realize forestry carbon sink
evidence_citations.country_citation: Based on the panel data of counties in Sichuan Province, China in 2000-2016
evidence_citations.target_population_citation: Based on the panel data of counties in Sichuan Province, China in 2000-2016
